程序包 org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.health

Auto-configuration for actuator health concerns.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CompositeHealthIndicatorConfiguration<H extends HealthIndicator,S>
    Base class for configurations that can combine source beans using a CompositeHealthIndicator.
    CompositeReactiveHealthIndicatorConfiguration<H extends ReactiveHealthIndicator,S>
    Reactive variant of CompositeHealthIndicatorConfiguration.
    HealthEndpointAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for HealthEndpoint.
    HealthIndicatorAutoConfiguration
    Auto-configuration for HealthIndicators.
    HealthIndicatorProperties
    Configuration properties for some health properties.
    HealthWebEndpointManagementContextConfiguration
    ManagementContextConfiguration for health endpoints.
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    ConditionalOnEnabledHealthIndicator
    Conditional that checks whether or not a default health indicator is enabled.

程序包org.springframework.boot.actuate.autoconfigure.health的说明

Auto-configuration for actuator health concerns.
